mapper.select: SELECT u.*, d.departmentName FROM User u LEFT JOIN department d ON u.department_no = d.department_no
mapper.insert: INSERT USER (loginId, password, name, email, userType, department_no) VALUES (#{loginId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{userType}, #{department_no})
mapper.update: UPDATE User SET loginId = #{loginId}, password = #{password}, name = #{name}, email = #{email}, userType = #{userType}, department_no = #{department_no}, WHERE no = #{no}
